titleStmt.title: Sameul G. Suddarth, Receipt to W. T. Scott
CWG13652

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 11; Bundles of AG & QMG Expenditures 1864-65; Bundle 1

body.p:
NO. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To W T Scott, Dr.

row.cell: To Seven months service as pay master in paying the Kentucky troops one months pay in advance at $15000 per Month

body.p: The Quarter Master General will order the payment of the above sum to W. T. Scott. Apl 7. 1864
I certify that the above account is correct and just, and that the services were rendered as stated, and were necessary for the public service.

Received at Frankfort Ky the 8th of April, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter=Master General for the State of Kentucky, Ten hundred & fifty dollars -- cents, in full of the above account.
(DUPLICATE.)
W T Scott

No. 22.
No 14 Abstract. M
W. T. Scott
Dollars 105000/100
Paid Apl 8 1864
